Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: An old IDF Air Force Dakota DC3 aircraft, which serve today as a playgroung for kindergarten children was used by unknown people for a discriminating graffiti saying: Blacks go home - Ashkenasim - to govern.
